channel.title: RSPS 562 - Getting rid of spawning & shop glitches
channel.description:
Hey guys,I was wondering if someone can teamview with me or add my msn shadowbmx99@hotmail.com.
This is because I am having trouble fixing my shops since,everytime I buy an item,it gives me the next item to the right.
Furthermore,I also need help removing spawn for regular players. Anyone graceful to help me out?:)I'l give you admin if you'd like. Note:The server wont be up for a while until I'm done fixing some of the mini's and interfaces. Thanks!
Yours truly,Danny. :cool:
